dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Feet" and "Cubits".
3 indexes: Reference figures -- Traditionary spots on the via Dolorosa -- References.
Shows topography, drainage, tribal boundaries, roads, places of historical interest.
Profile view: Section through the Temple buildings from east to west.
